title: Before Your Eyes
actors: Smyth Campbell, Carl Weintraub, Laurie O'Brien, Leigh McCloskey
plot: The family-based band, "Galvan," gathers in the evening to shoot a video of the epic song at the heart of their soon-to-be-released album. At the end of their rope -- the family is about to lose their home to foreclosure -- they're counting on the proceeds from the record to save them from the looming bank. What they didn't see coming, on this crucial night of nights, is the return of their long estranged father. He shows up, in very bad shape, and a frightening question arises -- does dad really mean to kill his family's dream?
